Terms of Service

ChatStream is a client side application only and provides no service. You are subject to the terms of service of the platforms hosting the chat content that this application connects to:

  • By enabling Discord within ChatStream you agree to be bound by the Discord Terms of Service
  • By enabling Twitch within ChatStream you agree to be bound by the Twitch Terms of Service
  • By enabling YouTube within ChatStream you agree to be bound by the YouTube Terms of Service.

Privacy Policy

ChatStream is a client side application only, no information is transmitted or stored with our servers. You are subject to the privacy policy of the platforms hosting the chat content that this application connects to:

  • Discord Privacy Policy
  • Twitch Privacy Policy
  • Google Privacy Policy

Click here to purge all ChatStream relevant data from your browser, including all preferences and authentication tokens.

YouTube API Services

ChatStream utilizes the YouTube API Services to retrieve your YouTube Live Broadcast data, specifically your user ID, live chat ID, Google OAuth token, and chat activity. This data is processed and stored locally in your browser and is utilized for the sole purpose of presenting chat activity to the end user. ChatStream attempts to automatically renew your Google OAuth token for the sole purpose of accessing YouTube API Services on your behalf. ChatStream does not transmit or share any of the YouTube related data to anyone other than YouTube API Services. The YouTube API may store, access or collect information directly or indirectly on or from users’ devices, including by placing, accessing or recognizing cookies or similar technology on users' devices or browsers. Cookies and similar technologies are used to enhance the user experience, monitor performance, and deliver relevant content. These technologies may collect information such as IP address, browser type, and usage behavior. YouTube complies with all relevant data protection standards. ChatStream itself does not utilize cookies or similar technologies.

You can revoke ChatStreams access to your YouTube account at any time via Google Security settings or directly at Google Security Account Connections.
